ques1: How many team members can I invite?
ans1: You can invite up to 2 additional users on the Free plan. There is no limit on team members for the Premium plan.

ques2: What is the maximum file upload size?
ans2: No more than 2GB. All files in your account must fit your allotted storage space.

ques3: How do I reset my password?
ans3: Click “Forgot password” from the login page or “Change password” from your profile page. A reset link will be emailed to you.

ans4: Yes! Send us a message and we'll process your request no questions asked.

ans5: Chat and email support is available 24/7. Phone lines are open during normal business hours.
